Hello there!

I am a game developer and a gamer. I have experience in developing 3D and 2D games, simulations and tools in Unity and Cocos Creator. I am well versed with C#, Typescript and have knowledge in Javascript, BabylonJs, C++ and Matlab. I enjoy debugging codes and fixing bugs. I always try to keep myself up-to-date in the skills relevant to the gaming industry.

I enjoy playing video games usually PC games. Call of Duty and Assassin's Creed games are my favorites. Apart from that, I love traveling and quite often go on bike rides. I am keen in learning about finances that help me improve my personal finance. I also read non-fictional books.


Space Survivor

This is a simple 3D space shooter kind of game developed using Unity for Android platform. Systems involved are procedural areana generation, enemy spawning, score mechanis and Unity ads (later removed). Learnt GIMP to create basic UI and explored a bit of blender to modify models downloaded from the internet. Play Store

FPS Multiplayer

This is a 3D FPS multiplayer game developed using Unity for PC. Systems involved are room creation and joining, player controller, health manager, voice chat using Photon Voice. Multiplayer functionality is achieved through Photon PUN2. Designed UI using GIMP. Download exe

Tic Tac Toe

This is a simple 3D space shooter kind of game developed using Unity for Android platform.


Byju's (Jan 2021 - Present)

I joined as a Game Developer and worked on Cocos Creator to develop 2D and 3D games. Worked on Babylon.js to create simple HTML5 page to render 3D objects. Few months later got promoted to Senior Game Developer and worked on creating parts of frameworks to develop 2D and 3D games at scale in Cocos Creator along with mentoring junior developers. Also worked on Unity to develop prototypes of VR experiences for Oculus Quest 2. A year later got promoted to Lead Engineer and started working on creating frameworks for developing 3D games at scale in Cocos Creator. Also did R&D for an AR project.

Literacy Matters Foundation (April 2019 - Jan 2021)

I joined as a Game Developer/Software Developer and worked on Unity and C# in developing a gamified application for iOS to help kids read and write. Integrated different plugins like native permission handling required for the application. Also, worked on Unity and C# in developing an augmented reality application for iOS which teaches kids how to read phonemes. Deployed the applications to the TestFlight, beta and public releases.

LabInApp Technology Pvt Ltd (June 2017 - March 2019)

I joined as a Unity Developer and worked on Unity and C# in developing 3D simulations for science concepts for class 6 to class 10 for Windows, Android and WebGL platforms. Worked on Unity Editor scripting to help automate application development and deployment. Worked on asset bundles for the Android platform. Worked on augmented reality and virtual reality for prototyping.

LabInApp Technology Pvt Ltd (July 2015 - March 2016)

I joined as a Unity Developer intern and worked on Unity and Cocos Creator in developing 3D and 2D simulations for laboratory experiments of class 8 to class 12 of CBSE for Windows, Android and WebGL platforms.
